name: SoulTitans
description:
On the brink of extinction, the Race known as Soul titans has been given one last hope.

Enough essence to power one of these living machines has been collected. Will it be enough to stand against the Hybris menace?


Controls

1) Use your mouse to guide your Soultitan

2) Left click to fire your auto - cannons

3) Right click fires your overcharge if you have one collected



Made as a solo dev for the GDL - Metal Monstrosity Jam. All modelled, designed and composed by Sunrock Entertainment.

If you like my work, be sure to follow me on:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SunrockEntertainment/

All feedback is always appreciated!
